Articles.Content:
The Rainbow, LV-909, Kerbal loving forumeer now has his own Youtube channel! Over there I will mainly be doing Video Game Mini Documentaries, live streams of KSP/Shovel Knight (and maybe I will do Castle Crashers, Super Meat Boy, Minecraft, etc. in the future), and do normal let's plays of the same things. I plan to eventually also show animations and other stuff once I have the power. So yeah, go to my channel if you want to see yet another forumeer on the small screen!

(Redacted)

(Also, if I ever go live or upload a vid, I will post here.) Cheers, Raincrafter.

Edited June 21, 2016 by RAINCRAFTER
Lifestream? A river that gives you immortality? I must find it!

First Video! Sorry I'm late posting this.

It's about the Sega Genesis, and I hope to impress, because this is a KSP forum, not a Sega forum.

Cheers, Raincrafter.

EDIT: Also, this can tie into KSP. I'm going to make a video on KSP now.

Edited September 8, 2015 by RAINCRAFTER

(Nothing to see here, guys)

There it is, my second video! This explains what the next month of my channel is going to be like, and also I've got a let's play video of Sonic 1 that's gonna go up soon.

Believe me, there will still be Kerbal on this channel!

Edited November 4, 2015 by RAINCRAFTER
The let's play is now up. Also remember, the kerbal will come!

Finally, something Kerbal related! It's a test of one of my crafts, and you can download it if you click the thing in my sig that says "The Probe Bros." or go to the video description. Both places will have the link somewhere, and if you go to The Probe Bros. for it, you will find lots of other crafts by me! Cheers, Raincrafter.
Like the videos, do you ever consider doing a full KSP lets play?
Yes, eventually. Cheers, Raincrafter.
Any new vids?

A KSP let's play! Finally, it's on my channel! YAYYYYcaps
Cheers, Raincrafter.

I will try to make Kerbals are Insane 2 over the weekend. I don't know if I will manage it, but I'm hoping so. All I have to tease is that EZvid might be used for part of the editing, the epsiode will be about piloting the rocket I built in Kerbals are Insane 1, and the episode will be called "Lucy in the Sky with Diamonds", referencing another Beatles song. Cheers, Raincrafter.

Double Feature!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FnKBmExV30I&feature=youtu.be

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L5z0m33St3s

One's a cool Halloween thing, and the other is the video I promised. Cheers, Raincrafter.

Okay, let me clear some things up. First of all, I'm not dead. Secondly, the reason the second "Kerbals are Insane!" video went private is because only part of the video was uploaded because of hard drive issues. That leads me to my next point; my 120 gigabyte hard drive in my Macbook Air laptop is not enough for all of my stuff, so that is why I couldn't upload the second version of the vid on the weekend. It has gotten so dire that, a few minutes ago, my laptop went extremely weird and I couldn't do anything. TWICE. So that is why, tomorrow, I SHOULD be getting a 1 terabyte portable external hard drive for my Mac, and I will be able to make vids again. If I don't get it tomorrow, then let's just hope for the best. Cheers,

Raincrafter.
Okay, here it is, the video. I hope you like it. Cheers, Raincrafter

StreamÃ¢â‚¬â€¹

What was the code knights used to have to follow? Chivalry. Is Shovel Knight abiding by this code of conduct. Heck Freaking Yes. Shovel Knight!

(Also, the stream is delayed by 30 seconds to improve on buffering.) I hope you enjoy the presentation. Cheers, Raincrafter.

Edited October 24, 2015 by RAINCRAFTER

Steam Games!

Oh God I'm going to die of boredom.
I just finished writing the script for The Kerbal Space Program Mini-Documentary. Will come out in October!

It is all gone. It is all gone.

Story Time! Youtube took down my account. I don't know why, I don't know how, they just did. My top theory on the subject is that some one hacked into my account and acted like a troll, but I just don't know. I sent an appeal to them, but I don't know if it will work. I am very concerned with my top theory if it is true, because someone could have broken off all of my youtube relationships with one nasty comment to someone. (I'm strongly talking about Astrogamer. Dude, if you were harassed by me, that wasn't the real me. I'm sorry.)

It is all gone. It is all gone.

Story Time! Youtube took down my account. I don't know why, I don't know how, they just did. My top theory on the subject is that some one hacked into my account and acted like a troll, but I just don't know. I sent an appeal to them, but I don't know if it will work. I am very concerned with my top theory if it is true, because someone could have broken off all of my youtube relationships with one nasty comment to someone. (I'm strongly talking about Astrogamer. Dude, if you were harassed by me, that wasn't the real me. I'm sorry.)

YouTube will take down your account if someone "claims" you are infringing on their copyright... even if you aren't. Their policy is guilty until proven innocent, and trolls take advantage of that and make false claims all the time. You just have to fight it.

YouTube will take down your account if someone "claims" you are infringing on their copyright... even if you aren't. Their policy is guilty until proven innocent, and trolls take advantage of that and make false claims all the time. You just have to fight it.

I already know this, but it said something about spam.

It is all gone. It is all gone.

Story Time! Youtube took down my account. I don't know why, I don't know how, they just did. My top theory on the subject is that some one hacked into my account and acted like a troll, but I just don't know. I sent an appeal to them, but I don't know if it will work. I am very concerned with my top theory if it is true, because someone could have broken off all of my youtube relationships with one nasty comment to someone. (I'm strongly talking about Astrogamer. Dude, if you were harassed by me, that wasn't the real me. I'm sorry.)

That must suck dude. But youtube has a guilty till proven innocent thing with copyright claims. Unless you get in touch with some people that can protest against youtube or get in contact with a lawyer nothing will change.

Game plan. Once 1.1 comes out, I will make a new channel and put some classics on there, along with new vids.

EDIT: Oh my lord! I got an email back from Google saying exactly why my account was terminated. They said I was a robot overloading the system. I am clearly a human being, so I sent another appeal to Google stating why I was not a robot. Let's hope they listen again and they bring my account back up!

EDIT2: My account is back up. Thank you, world. Will upload The KSP Mini-Documentary on November 1st.

Edited October 28, 2015 by RAINCRAFTER

I'll check out the comment, but don't worry, I believe you.

Oh great! I just went to your channel saying "wait, what? I thought it was terminated?" (not in a bad way) but I'm glad you're back.

I can't even find the comment XD Where did the hacker send it?

I can't even find the comment XD Where did the hacker send it?
That was just a theory, what really happened was that Google mistook me for a bot overloading the system.

EDIT: Guess what? I'm working on The KSP Mini-Documentary again also.

Edited October 31, 2015 by RAINCRAFTER

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a-FlMeYBWw4


A vlog about the future. Sorry the KSP Mini-Documentary is delayed, there's just so much to do both in IRL and when I get a chance to work on the video.
Cheers, Raincrafter.
